extent: in northern iraq, u.s. marines and residents exchanged gunfire in the city of mosul today, in the second day of civil disturbances there
Sentence: in northern iraq , u . s. marines and residents exchanged gunfire in the city of mosul today , in the second day of civil disturbances there. a senior kurdish intelligence official says citizens were protesting the american occupation of the city 's main government building. seven iraqis were killed by u . s. marines , who say they were responding to sniper fire. hospital officials say 17 people have been killed and 18 wounded over the past 2 days. central command says troops were involved in a gun battle yesterday .
